alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 1:03PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Yavapai County between Cordes Junction and highway 169 through 145 PM MST... At 101 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Cherry, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cherry and Powell Springs Campground. This includes Interstate 17 between mile markers 266 and 280. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
